lead_paragraph: After an article examined flaws in the N.F.L.’s early concussion research and the league’s ties to the tobacco industry, the league responded with a statement disputing various aspects. The Times then responded.

headline.main: N.F.L. Issues Statement About Article and The Times Responds

snippet: After an article examined flaws in the N.F.L.’s early concussion research and the league’s ties to the tobacco industry, the league responded with a statement disputing various aspects. The Times then responded.
